content: the wicked wildlings are a series of animal themed voodoo dolls thistlehop is a cute bunny voodoo doll materials 4 5mm hook worsted weight yarn in two colors - a lighter color for the head body & limbs and a darker color for the ears embroidery floss or crochet thread for stitch lines mouth & other details safety eye or button for one eye optional safety nose small piece of felt or fabric for heart & foot pads worked in the round - top-down pattern is not tested aside from myself i have double checked it but feel free to message me with any questions
